root.name: Monster Trucks Nitro
root.description: About the GameMonster trucks nitro is a racing game. It is based on the Monster Truck flash games available on miniclip.com and features 3D graphics but gameplay takes place in a 2D plane. It features 3 trucks at the start, a Red Lynx branded truck, A miniclip branded truck, and a school bus truck. A fourth "Formula Truck" can be unlocked by getting gold medals on all the levels.System RequirementsPCOS: Windows XP or Windows VistaProcessor: 1,5 GHz Pentium 4, AMD Athlon 1500 or higherMemory: 256 MBDirectX Version: 9.0cGraphics: Nvidia GeForce FX 5600, ATI 9500, Intel GMA 950 or higherDisplay:Hard Drive: 300 MBSound: An OpenAL compatible sound cardMacOS: OS X version Leopard 10.5.8, Snow Leopard 10.6.3, or later.Processor: Any Intel CPUMemory: 512 MBGraphics: Intel GMA 950 or betterHard Drive: 250 MBiPhone VersionA version of Monster Trucks Nitro has been announced for the Apple iPhone and iPod touch. It will feature everything in the PC and Mac release, but will feature new "bubble level rotation control" (athough it is not yet clear what this will be) and multiple camera modes.
